title: Guaire's 2024 Sciptember Pixelart
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Day 1 - Pending]]

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/guaire/sciptember-1.png]]

SCP-7003 - Three White Horses. By [[*user TheyCallMeTim]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 2 - Empathic]]

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/guaire/scp%208299.png]]

SCP-8299 - TRUE NORTH STRONG AND FREE. By [[*user SpaceStealth]] & [[*user Lt Flops]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Day 3 - Appliance]]

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/guaire/sciptember-appliance.png]]
SCP-3090 - This girl's gone bad on a game attack!. By [[*user Decibelles]] [[*user th4nkyoub3n]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 6 - Phenomenom]]

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/guaire/sciptember-phenomena.png]]

SCP-4028 - La Historia de Don Quixote de La Mancha. By [[*user The Great Hippo]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 8 - extraterrestrial]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/sciptember-extraterrestrial.png]]

SCP-7755 - A Hole Dug With a Rabbit's Foot By [[*user Crow-Cat]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 9 - cognitohazard]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/scptember-infohazard-shyguy.png]]

SCP-096 - The "Shy Guy" [[*user Dr Dan]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 11 - nightfall]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/sciptember-nightfall.png]]

SCP-6248 — The White Phlegm of Yvith [[*user LORDXVNV]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 12- thaumaturgy]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/sciptember-thaumaturgy-8048.png]]

SCP-8404 ⁠— That One Time The Foundation Attempted To Use SIMULACRUM Technology To Contain A Keter-Class Entity In Another World [[*user J T K C]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 20- Eventyr]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/sciptember-eventyr.png]]

Eventyr version of SCP-166
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 27- Wanderer's Library]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aguaire-s-2024-sciptember-pixelart/rounderpede.png]]

Rounderpede by [[*user ROUNDERHOUSE]][[/tab]]


[[/tabview]]

Remenber to check regularly through September! More will be posted.
author: Guaire
